Title: THESE TWO CIRCLES REPRESENT TWO KINDS OF LIVES.
Content1: s - Self is on the throne.     † - Christ is outside the life.    o - Interests are directed by self, often resulting in discord and frustration.
Content2: † - Christ is in the life and on the throne.     s - Self is yielding to Christ.      o - Interests are directed by Christ, resulting in harmony with God's plan.
Content3: Which circle best represents your life? Which circle would you like to have represent your life?
End: The following explains how you can receive Christ ...
